text: Roger Herschel Zion (September 17, 1921 - September 24, 2019) was an American politician. He was elected as a Republican to the United States House of Representatives from Indiana in the 1966 election to the 90th Congress and was re-elected to the three succeeding Congresses, serving from January 3, 1967 to January 3, 1975. Zion was an unsuccessful candidate for reelection in 1974 to the 94th Congress, losing to Philip H. Hayes. Zion died at his home in Evansville, Indiana on September 24, 2019 at the age of 98. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1921 births Category:2019 deaths Category:United States representatives from Indiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Michigan
